tool_description: OnlyFans API - Your gateway to content creators. Access exclusive content and analyze data with our API.
name: OnlyFans API
title: OnlyFans API

api_list.name: Get posts model by Model ID
api_list.description:
Allows to obtain posts of the model by model ID.
Model ID can be obtained in the endpoint named 'Get profile model by nickname'.

The parameter "sort" can take the following values: 'publish_date_asc', 'publish_date_desc', 'tips_summ_desc', 'tips_summ_asc', 'favorites_count_asc', 'favorites_count_desc'.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://onlyfans-api5.p.rapidapi.com/posts/373009669/10/publish_date_desc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "onlyfans-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://onlyfans-api5.p.rapidapi.com/posts/{model_id}/{limit}/{sort}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "onlyfans-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get buttons model by Model ID
api_list.description:
Allows to obtain buttons (YouTube, Twitter, Twitch, TikTok, Snapchat, Patreon, Instagram, Discord, etc.) by model ID.
The model ID can be obtained in the endpoint called 'Get profile model by nickname'.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://onlyfans-api5.p.rapidapi.com/buttons/373009669"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "onlyfans-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get profile model by nickname
api_list.description: Allows to obtain information about a model by its nickname
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://onlyfans-api5.p.rapidapi.com/users/xoxoaliciaxoxo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "onlyfans-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://onlyfans-api5.p.rapidapi.com/users/{nickname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "onlyfans-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
